resources.string:
GamePlan Terms and Conditions\n\n
Effective Date: February 4th, 2025\n
Welcome to GamePlan! By using this app, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
1. Acceptance of Terms\n By accessing or using GamePlan, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using the app.
2. User Responsibilities\n
You are responsible for any actions taken through your GamePlan account. Do not use GamePlan for any unlawful activities or purposes. Please play nice: no harassment, offensive language, or other inappropriate behavior. 3. App Usage
GamePlan is intended for entertainment purposes only. We make no guarantees that the app will always function flawlessly. Expect occasional glitchesâ€”this is technology, after all! 4. Intellectual Property All content, graphics, and app features belong to GamePlan (the school assignment version, anyway). Copying, distributing, or reverse-engineering is a no-no.
5. Data Collection We don't collect any personal data right now, but if we did, it would be treated responsibly.
6. Liability Limitations
Use GamePlan at your own risk. We are not responsible for lost progress, heated debates with friends, or app-induced existential crises. 7. Updates and Changes We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Updates will be posted here with an effective date.
8. Contact For questions or concerns, reach out to GamePlan's totally real support team at [Insert Fake Email Address].
